name: Run Muybridge, run!
description:
A SILENT GAME ADVENTURE

"[…] tackle past and present media cultures in parallel lines." (1)

Bring movement back into the motion studies of early photographer Eadweard Muybridge (1830-1904)!

This game is inspired by Jussi Parikka's work on media archaeology.

* Choose between 21 different CHARACTERS,

* 3 DISCIPLINS,

* play the SINGLE PLAYER mode and beat the HIGHSCORE,

* play MULTI PLAYER mode to compete with friends within the same Wi-Fi network

* OR simply resurrect pre-cinematic technology and forget the time

_ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _

(1) Jussi Parikka, What is Media Archaeology?, London: Polity Press 2012, p.14.
